value:
Many of the Heroes who preceded
me here are the dignified sort.$k$pBut there are also many who appear
to be quite strong... My brother is
sure to be pleased by that.

My country is both beautiful and
peaceful. My duty is to understand
what sacrifices maintain it as such.

Would you care to join me for tea?
I have some here with me... Just a
drop of honey makes it truly superb.

There is some time before our next
battle, so I hope to use it to find
some small joys here.$k$pAre there four-leafed clovers in this
world, by chance?

Would you be so kind as to show me
to the library? I would like to learn
more about Askr while I'm here.

Hello, my name is Céline. I have the
joyful task of delivering greetings
from $Nf.

Such joys can be overwhelming, but
I am grateful for them all the same.

Wonderful. This is the strength I have
hoped to develop as princess.

Next time, I will seek to gain the
strength I need in the fight for peace.

It feels as if my heart is all abloom...
I will not disappoint the faith you've
placed in me.

I am Céline, princess of Firene. In the
fight for peace, I will bring to bear all
the luck and strength I am able.

I'm so glad you agreed to join me
for tea, $Nu.$k$pIt's always a joy when we're able
to spend time together like this.$k$pYou know, there is something
about you that reminds me of the
Divine Dragon...$k$pPerhaps it is your divine weapon,
and your power to summon Heroes
into the world.$k$pWhatever the reason may be, I feel
I can trust you completely—which is
a rare thing indeed.$k$pA peaceful kingdom like Firene is
at risk if it allows itself to be taken
advantage of.$k$pFor that reason, I am cautious when
it comes to those who hail from other
countries, but with you...$k$pWell, I hope you don't mind, but it
would bring me joy to think of you as
my ally—and close friend. Heh heh...
It's teatime!
You need pruning!
Isn't this your lucky day?
I will do what I must.
I was so happy…
You have much in common with both the Emblems and the Divine Dragon. Quite the mystery, you are.
Oh, would you like to have tea? Very well, what shall we brew today?
Tell me more about the Order of Heroes. What are some of your guiding principles?
I hope that my aid can bring happiness to this land.
All of these Heroes… This castle is a riot of flowers in bloom. How delightful!
In truth, I do miss Elyos. But I will do what I must for Askr while I am here.
Your happiness must stem from all the wonderful friends that surround you. I hope I may count myself among them.
Naturally.
Power blooms in me.
My will is firm.
